Name: Human-powered spacecraft
About the game: A nostalgia-infused pixel clicker in a comedy wrapper.  You play the part of a colonist set out to conquer new planets. As a supernova explosion takes out your ship's energy reserves, your only hope of getting back on course is a jerry-rigged old dynamo. The game has: * Stylish retro graphics * A witty computer for a partner * Ship improvements in all directions: a dynamo, a potato farm for energy generation and, of course, an antimatter distiller * Smooth acceleration up to hyper-speed  * Space octopuses And no lootboxes!
